name: CASE: Animatronics
overview: Welcome to the police department, where staying to work late can have tragic consequences. You are John Bishop, an overworked detective, and you are conducting an investigation late into the night. After a rare dream, you are awakened by a mysterious call from an old "friend", when everything goes out of control. The police department is without power, the security system has been hacked, and all exits are closed. But that is not the real problem. Someone is following you ... someone with red eyes who is made of metal. They are known as animatronics. It is time to find out what is happening. And remember ... no one will be able to hear you scream. FEATURES A tablet to carefully review security cameras. The police station area is the key to saving yourself. Be quiet, stay alert, move quickly, and remember that all you have are your legs, tablet, and a flashlight. Hide and Sneak. Use the closets and cabinets to hide and escape the animatronics while trying to relax for a second. Animatronics. Its metal legs and arms will treat you very well. Prepare to be amazed by their abilities. Find out what's going on. Explore the police department for an explanation. Don't forget to pay attention to your surroundings and consider any changes in the area - this can save your life.
